original_text: For a married woman is bound by law to her husband while he lives, but if her husband dies she is released from the law of marriage.
korean_text: 남편 있는 여인이 그 남편 생전에는 법으로 그에게 매인 바 되나 만일 그 남편이 죽으면 남편의 법에서 벗어나느니라

sentences.original_text: For a married woman is bound by law to her husband
sentences.korean_translation: 결혼한 여자는 법으로 남편에게 묶여 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: she is released from the law of marriage
